refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the node of the given attribute

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the node of the attribute named name in the current element. The name parameter is case sensitive.
If no attribute with given name is found, &false; is returned.

example.title: Getting an attribute node
example.programlisting:
<?php

include("example.inc");

if (!$dom = domxml_open_mem($xmlstr)) {
    echo "Error while parsing the document\n";
    exit;
}

$root = $dom->document_element();
if ($attribute = $root->get_attribute_node('language')) {
    echo 'Language is: ' . $attribute->value() . "\n";
}

?>
